record.field: This drug might require an authorisation for importation and/or exportation. Refer to the MSF Medical Catalog or to the introduction of Medical Order Lists.
This kind of article needs a more detailed description of the context in which it will be used.
Article out of production. Can be available only in a warehouse or in headquarters (refurbished).
The article is potentially subject to important modifications (supply sources, better alternatives).
The article is expensive and its choice should be justified in relation to cheaper alternatives.
Monitor the use, efficacy for at least one year after the introduction of new drugs.
The article may imply medical risks if misused by persons with insufficient training or knowledge.
The article may imply medical risks if misused by persons with insufficient training. Expensive.
The article may imply medical risks if misused + monitor the use, efficacy at least one year.
The article and its specifications are obsolete or are no longer the international standard.
The article and its specifications are obsolete, it may imply a medical risk if misused.
The article and its specifications are obsolete, it has to be used only in a specific program.
The article must be used only in a properly designed program.
Article must be used only in a properly designed program, needs a more detailed description.
Article must be used only in a properly designed program, potentially subject to modifications.
Article must be used only in a properly designed program, potentially subject to modificat., exp.
See respective single code description: P, C, M and E.
Article must be used only in a properly designed program. Expensive, cheaper alternatives exist.
Article must be used only in a properly designed program + monitor the use, efficacy.
Article must be used only in a properly designed program, it may imply a medical risk if misused.
Article must be used only in a properly designed program, it may imply a medical risk if misused. Expensive.
